resetYourPassword: Dib u deji eraygaaga sirta ah ee akoonkaaga chancellorminus.com.
sendPasswordResetEmail: Dir iimaylka Dib-u-dejinta Erayga Sirta Ah
languageDescription: Mawduuca bogga iyo isdhexgalka AI waxay isticmaali doonaan luqadda aad doorbidayso.
passwordResetEmailSent: Iimaylka Dib-u-dejinta Erayga Sirta Ah Waa La Diray
checkYourInbox: Fadlan ka eeg sanduuqaaga fariimaha tilmaamaha dib-u-dejinta eraygaaga sirta ah.
errorSendingResetEmail: Khalad Markii La Dirayey Iimaylka Dib-u-dejinta
iChancellorWelcome: Hello, anigu waxaan ahay iChancellor. Waxaan halkaan u joogaa inaan kugu taageero jidkaaga fayo-qabka. Sideen kuu caawin karaa maanta? Waxaan ka wada hadli karnaa miyir-qabka, caadooyinka caafimaadka leh, ama waxaan bilaabi karnaa feker hageed.
pageTitle: Chancellor Minus | Ganacsade, Injineer AI & Horumariye Buuxa
pageDescription: Portfolio buuxa oo AI-ku shaqeeya oo soo bandhigaya mashaariicda iyo xirfadaha Chancellor Minus.
landingTitle: Mustaqbalka Horumarinta AI ee Wakiilka iyo Abuurista — Maanta
landingSubtitle: Chancellor Minus | Ganacsade, Injineer AI & Horumariye Buuxa
landingSearchPlaceholder: Raadi mashaariic... tusaale ahaan 'Sahami mashaariicda AI iyo hal-abuurka Chancellor'
noProjectsFound: Lama helin mashaariic u dhigma '{searchQuery}'. Iskuday raadin kale.
aiDeepDive: Falanqayn Qoto Dheer oo AI ah
ctaDescription: Is diiwaan geli akoon si aad u hesho 'Nolol Caafimaad Qabta' — albaabkaaga fadhiyada fekerka ee la hago, taageerada fayo-qabka shakhsi ahaaneed ee iChancellor – caawiyahaaga fayo-qabka AI, iyo helitaanka gaarka ah ee Generator-ka Fahamka Teknolojiyada ee aragtiyaha cusub ee teknolojiyada iyo fayo-qabka.
adminDescription: Maamul isticmaalayaasha, eeg waxqabadka, oo la soco arjiga.
reportingDescription: Soo saar warbixino ku saabsan ka-qaybgalka isticmaalaha iyo caafimaadka nidaamka. (Goor dhow)
affirmationsDescription: Soo saar xaqiijin togan si ay kuu dhiirigeliso oo ay kugu dhiirigeliso safarkaaga koritaanka shakhsi ahaaneed.
affirmationsInitialText: Riix badhanka si aad u soo saarto xaqiijin oo aad u bilowdo safarkaaga.
affirmationError: Waxaa jiray khalad markii la soo saarayey xaqiijin. Fadlan isku day markale.
aiAssistantTitle: Laga soo bilaabo Fikradda AI ilaa Xaqiiqda Wax-soo-saarka
aiAssistantDescription: Waxaan naqshadeeyaa, dhisaa, oo aan ballaariyaa xalal AI oo caqli badan oo wax-abuur leh oo xalliya caqabadaha ganacsi ee adag.
dashboardWelcome: Soo dhowow, {name}! Dooro mawduuc si aad u hesho aragtiyihii ugu dambeeyay ee AI-ku shaqeeya.
techInsightDescription: Dooro mawduuc oo u oggolow falanqeeyaha AI inuu ku siiyo soo koobid iyo talooyin.
insightPlaceholder: Fahamkaaga AI-soo saaray ayaa halkan ka soo muuqan doona.
loginDescription: Geli aqoonsigaaga si aad u gasho dashboard-kaaga.
venturesDescription: Bandhig shirkadaha iyo alaabada AI-ku shaqeeya ee aan dhisay.
createAccountAndVerify: Akoonkaaga waa la sameeyay! Fadlan ka eeg iimaylkaaga si aad u xaqiijiso akoonkaaga.
welcomeNewUser: Ku soo dhowow {name} barmaamijka Chancellor Minus!
createAccountDescription: Isdiiwaan geli si aad u bilowdo.
aiAssistantWelcome: Hello! Waxaan ahay caawiyaha AI ee Chancellor. I weydii wax kasta oo ku saabsan xirfadihiisa iyo waayo-aragnimadiisa.
aiAssistantPlaceholder: tusaale ahaan, Waa maxay waayo-aragnimadiisa backend?
activeUsersDescription: Eeg isticmaalayaasha hadda firfircoon ka ah bogga.
lastSeen: Markii Ugu Dambaysay ee La Arkay
auditLogsDescription: La soco dhacdooyinka muhiimka ah iyo ficillada guud ahaan arjiga.
caseStudyTitle: {projectTitle} - Falanqayn Qoto Dheer oo AI ah
caseStudyDescription: Daraasaddan kiiska farsamada waxaa soo saaray caawiye AI ah.
contactDescription: Ma haysaa su'aal mise waxaad doonaysaa inaad wada shaqaysaan? Fariin ii soo dir.
footerText: © {year} Chancellor Minus. Xuquuqda oo dhan way xifdisan tahay.
healthyLivingDescription: Wada-hawlgalayaashaaga miyir-qabka, caafimaadka, iyo koritaanka shakhsi ahaaneed.
skillsDescription: Fiirin teknoolojiyada aan la shaqeeyo si aan fikradaha ugu soo nooleeyo, laga soo bilaabo frontend ilaa keenista.
transcriberDescription: Diiwaan geli ama soo geli cod si aad ugu qorto adigoo isticmaalaya Whisper-ka OpenAI.
audioReady: Codka diyaar u ah qoritaanka ({size} KB).
noAudioDescription: Fadlan diiwaan geli ama soo geli fayl cod ah marka hore.
affirmationPrompt: Aan abuurno xaqiijinta maanta si aan maskaxdaada u mideyno oo aan u dhiirigelino naftaada ugu fiican.
